means: 普拉亚（非洲岛国佛得角首都）

sentence.Network_en: In September the country's second airport, in the capital of Praia , began receiving international flights.
sentence.Network_cn: 9月,佛得角的第二个机场在首都普拉亚开始接纳国际航班.

sentence.Network_en: Madeleine vanished from an apartment in the Portuguese resort of Praia da Luz two weeks ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 马德琳两周前从葡萄牙旅游胜地的一间旅馆突然失踪.
